mapper.select: select t.order_id,t.seller_id,t.type_id,t.point_balance,t.pi_balance,u.user_name,u.user_image,t.status from tradin_order t join user_info u on u.uid=t.seller_id where t.seller_id=#{userId} or t.buyer_id=#{userId} order by t.update_time desc

select t.order_id,t.seller_id,t.buyer_id,t.type_id,t.point_balance,t.pi_balance,t.pi_address,t.status,t.image_url,u1.user_name as sellerName,u1.user_image as sellerImageUrl,u2.user_name as buyerName,u2.user_image as buyerImageUrl from tradin_order t join user_info u1 on u1.uid=t.seller_id join user_info u2 on u2.uid=t.buyer_id where t.order_id=#{orderId}
